home.title: EmpowerHub
home.subtitle: Ku Tiyisisa Vanwanati hi Nseketelo wo Hlanganisiwa
home.tagline: Ku tiyisisa ku tiyimela, vuhlayiseki na xikwembu.

financialSupport.title: Nseketelo wa Timali
financialSupport.description: Kuma switsundzuxo swa ku tshama mali leswi lulamiseriweke eka wena naswona u nghena eka minhlangano ya timali leyi tiyisisaka.

gbvSupport.title: Nseketelo wa GBV
gbvSupport.description: Kuma nseketelo wo hatlisa na tindhawu to hlayiseka to sirheleka loko u ti lava swinene.

sanitaryAid.title: Mpfuno wa Ku Basisa
sanitaryAid.description: Kuma mabokisi ya swiphiwo ya le kufupi naswona u fikelela switirhisiwa swa ku basisa leswi lavekaka.

aiAssistant.title: Mupfuni wa AI
aiAssistant.description: Kuma tinhlamulo to hatlisa na nhlamuselo ku suka eka sisiteme ya hina ya nseketelo leyi rhandzaka.

submitRequests.title: Rhumela Swikombelo
submitRequests.description: Rhumela naswona u landzelela swikombelo swa wena swa nseketelo hi sisiteme ya hina leyi olova ku yi tirhisa.

aboutUs.title: Hi Hina
aboutUs.description: Dyondza swo tala hi xikongomelo xa hina xo tiyisisa vanwanati eka Afrika Dzonga hinkwayo.

cta.title: U Lulamerile ku Sungula?
cta.description: Joyina tinkume ta vanwanati lava kumeke nseketelo na ku tiyisisiwa hi pulatifomo ya hina.
cta.button: Rhumela Xikombelo xa Wena xo Sungula
